document.full_text: three days after abkhazia announced that a fifth government, vanuatu, had agreed to formally recognize its sovereignty, an official from vanuatu said the report was false.
document.title: vanuatu recognizes abkhazia. or maybe not.
lines_and_colors: three days after abkhazia announced that a fifth government, vanuatu, had agreed to formally recognize its sovereignty, an official from vanuatu said the report was false.
